001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.capture;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PacketSource;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.RawFrame;
005import java.util.Optional;
006
007/**
008 * Placeholder packet source used until the live CLI wires the real capture adapter.
009 * Starting it throws to signal incomplete wiring at runtime.
010 */
011public final class DisabledPacketSource implements PacketSource {
012  /**
013   * Creates a disabled packet source placeholder.
014   *
015   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
016   */
017  public DisabledPacketSource() {}
018
019  /**
020   * No-op start method for the disabled source.
021   *
022   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
023   */  @Override
024  public void start() {
025    throw new UnsupportedOperationException("PacketSource not configured");
026  }
027
028  /**
029   * Always returns {@link Optional#empty()}.
030   *
031   * @return always empty
032   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
033   */  @Override
034  public Optional<RawFrame> poll() {
035    return Optional.empty();
036  }
037
038  @Override
039  public void close() {}
040}
041
